_source.short_desc: Salesflare is an intelligent CRM for small and medium sized B2B businesses, who want to sell more with less work.
_source.long_desc:
Salesflare is an intelligent CRM for small and medium sized B2B businesses, who want to sell more with less work.

Salesflare automatically fills out your address book and keeps track of all interactions with the people you're in contact with. It takes data from email, social media, company databases, phone, calendar and hands it to you in automated customer timelines that tell you everything you need to know.

You just have to write the emails, make the calls, and have the coffee.
_source.pricing_details:
Free trial (up to 30 days), no credit card required.

Growth plan:
Annual billing: 29 usd/user/month
Monthly billing: 35 usd/user/month

Pro plan:
Annual billing: 49 usd/user/month
Monthly billing: 55 usd/user/month
_source.target_audience: Ideally suited for small and medium sized B2B businesses who want to sell more with less work. Used by thousands of agencies and fast growing companies around the world.

category_features.name: Alerts/Notifications
category_features.definition: Notifications for new property listings

category_features.name: Campaign Management
category_features.definition: Create a collection of marketing actions to complete specific goals

category_features.name: Client/Property Matching
category_features.definition: Matching property according to applicants

category_features.name: Contact Management
category_features.definition: Store and find contact information such as names, addresses, and social media accounts

category_features.name: Email Marketing
category_features.definition: Create and send email blasts/campaigns

category_features.name: Lead Management
category_features.definition: Store information about leads and contacts and track them through the sales process

category_features.name: Referral Tracking
category_features.definition: Log and store the source of contacts/leads

category_features.name: Segmentation
category_features.definition: Group leads or contacts based on their specific characteristics

category_features.name: AI/Machine Learning
category_features.definition: Software program that continuously adjusts its behavior based on observed data

category_features.name: Alerts/Notifications
category_features.definition: Alerts/notifications within the system

category_features.name: Customizable Scoring
category_features.definition: Adjust the weighting of various scoring criteria to control how scores are calculated

category_features.name: Data Enrichment
category_features.definition: Combines data from internal sources with disparate data from other internal systems or external sources

category_features.name: Demographic / Firmographic Data
category_features.definition: Characteristics for segmenting companies or customers

category_features.name: Lead Distribution
category_features.definition: Manually or automatically assign leads to sales reps

category_features.name: Lead Qualification
category_features.definition: Score a lead on their quality or likelihood to buy based on certain behaviors

category_features.name: Multiple Scoring Models
category_features.definition: Create multiple models or equations for generating scores

category_features.name: Predictive Analytics
category_features.definition: Predict future data based on historical data sets

category_features.name: Prioritization
category_features.definition: Arrange activities and tasks based on their relative importance

category_features.name: Process/Workflow Automation
category_features.definition: Design workflow paths once and apply the logic to enable automatic creation of future processes and workflows

related_products.short_desc: Drive growth with Sales Cloud 360, the best-in-class sales solution that drives rep productivity on the world's #1 CRM platform.
related_products.features: Sales Cloud 360 is a customizable CRM platform that grows with your team. Empower agents to provide faster response times through instant messaging and personalized auto responses. Help them maintain relationships with reminders and nonintrusive client emails. Get real-time customer information and activity in one place, plus insights with dashboards and reports. Connect to thousands of business apps to extend your CRM to every department.

related_products.short_desc: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster.
related_products.features: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster. As the backbone for your customer relationships, they provide AI-powered, user-friendly tools anyone can use to be successful. Mailchimp puts your audience at the center so you can send marketing emails and automated messages, create targeted ad campaigns, build landing pages, send postcards, facilitate reporting and analytics, and sell online.

related_products.short_desc: Zoho CRM is an omnichannel, online software for real estate agencies to manage business processes, sales & marketing.
related_products.features: Zoho CRM enables real estate agents, developers, and brokerage firms to take control of their business processes. This omnichannel, cloud-based software solution is a centralized platform for sales process management, property management, and automation, and seamlessly integrates with 500+ third-party apps. Zoho CRM is mobile-friendly and allows users to access data and communicate with teams in real-time.

related_products.short_desc: Zendesk provides the complete customer service solution that's easy to use and scales with your business.
related_products.features: Zendesk is the only complete customer service solution, that is both easy to use and scales with your business. On average, companies using Zendesk increase customer satisfaction by 25% and agent productivity by 30% - at any scale. All your customer interactions live in a single, dynamic interface with features like web widgets, pre-defined ticket responses, and a full customer history. Get up and running quickly, and expect to see results even faster.

related_products.short_desc: Pipedrive is an easy to implement real estate CRM tool that helps you focus on the activities that drive deals to close.
related_products.features: Closing housing deals has never been easier thanks to Pipedrives powerful yet agile real estate CRM software. Keep everyone in your team focused on the activities that drive clients to purchase or rent, from property evaluations and showings, to communications strategies. Home sellers and property agents love Pipedrive for its versatility, intuitive design, and robust mobile CRM that keeps you updated on deals and activities while moving between properties.

related_products.short_desc: Nimble is the simple, smart CRM for Office 365 & G Suite that works for you -- everywhere you work.
related_products.features: Nimble is the simple, smart CRM for Office 365 & G Suite that works for you by automatically combining your contacts, communication histories, email inboxes, and calendar appointments with over 250+ SaaS business app contacts and social media connections (including Linkedin, Twitter, Facebook) into one unified team relationship manager.

related_products.short_desc: Airtable combines an intuitive spreadsheet interface with file attachments, kanban boards, calendars, and other powerful features.
related_products.features: Airtable is the all-in-one collaboration platform that combines the flexibility of a spreadsheet interface with rich features like file attachments, kanban card stacks, calendars, and reporting.

related_products.short_desc: Deliver mission critical service faster with Incident Management
related_products.features: Service Cloud 360, the world's #1 customer service platform, empowers companies to drive seamless engagement across the entire customer journey. Address incidents quickly by ensuring your teams can identify, track, and fix issues with proven workflows. Give agents and service operations teams full visibility into incidents, cases, and customer data in a single workspace. Create an even better customer experience with Incident Management best practices built into the #1 service platform.

related_products.short_desc: Copper is the easy-to-use CRM that's designed for and recommended by Google. Want to be more organized and productive? Try it now.
related_products.features: Copper is specifically built for Google Workspace, so you can easily manage and market new listings, drive traffic to open houses, and nurture repeat clients right from your inbox, especially while you're on the go! Copper automagically logs all your emails and other interactions to the right contact for you. You can also see your sales and relationship essentials from email threads, to past interactions, to tasks... all in one place.

related_products.short_desc: Small business software to manage leads, customer information, contact history and reminders, and emails.
related_products.features:
Over ten thousand real estate agents, agencies, brokers and other small businesses use Less Annoying CRM to manage their contacts, leads, notes, calendar, to-do's and more, all from one simple web app. Our product is founded on three core principles: simplicity, affordability, and outstanding customer service. 

All users get an unlimited free 30-day trial to exhaustively test every aspect of the CRM, and customer service is always free by phone and email.

related_products.short_desc: Freshsales is packed with features and a highly intuitive UI so that you don't have to juggle multiple tools to run your business.
related_products.features: Freshsales is a full-fledged sales force automation solution for sales teams. It provides everything a salesperson needs to- attract quality leads, engage in contextual conversations, drive deals with AI-powered insights, and nurture customer relationships. With built-in email, phone, chat, and telephony, Freshsales empowers sales teams with more time for selling by automating the sales process and increases efficiency and productivity in their daily activities.

similar_products.short_desc: Quickbase is a no-code operational agility platform that enables organizations to improve operations through insights and automation.
similar_products.features: Improve your team's accountability and productivity with a flexible real estate CRM that matches your complex sales process exactly. Track tasks, leads, and opportunities in real time. Built-in mobile forms and workflows keep everything moving, trigger-based actions make your team more productive, and automated reporting keeps your stakeholders in the know. Improve operations through real-time insights and automation with Quickbase's real estate management platform.

similar_products.short_desc: AppFolio Investment Management is a real estate software partner that streamlines your investor experiences and investment operations.
similar_products.features:
AppFolio Investment Management is commercial real estate software that enhances your investor experiences & simplifies your investment operations.

In other words, we are:

A digital portal that strengthens your reputation and personalizes your investor experiences at scale.

A streamlined workflow that automates your investment operations while adding an extra layer of accuracy and security.

A single source of truth that fuels thoughtful transparency for your teams and investors.

similar_products.short_desc: Freshsales is packed with features and a highly intuitive UI so that you don't have to juggle multiple tools to run your business.
similar_products.features: Freshsales is a full-fledged sales force automation solution for sales teams. It provides everything a salesperson needs to- attract quality leads, engage in contextual conversations, drive deals with AI-powered insights, and nurture customer relationships. With built-in email, phone, chat, and telephony, Freshsales empowers sales teams with more time for selling by automating the sales process and increases efficiency and productivity in their daily activities.

similar_products.short_desc: A CRM & Workflow system for the real estate industry, that offers contacts, properties transactions, dates, and search management.
similar_products.features: Realvolve is a web-based CRM and workflow software for Realtors and real estate businesses. The software offers features for contact management, task management, property transaction management, as well as connectivity with third-party software for specific integrations.

similar_products.short_desc: amoCRM is the world's first messaging-powered CRM. It features sales pipeline, lead tracking, multichannel communication and more.
similar_products.features: Ideal for real estate professionals, amoCRM is the world's first messaging-powered CRM. Multi-channel communication lets you converse through messengers, emails and calls straight from the CRM. Every interaction with a customer becomes a personalized one-on-one dialogue. Plus managers love our powerful analytics, reporting and automation tools. It's perfect for keeping track of properties, deals and listings - while also keeping in touch with leads.

similar_products.short_desc: IDX website, real estate CRM, and marketing solutions that help real estate agents & brokers grow their business.
similar_products.features:
For over 20 years, thousands of real estate professionals have relied on us to deliver the best IDX property search and technology solutions that help them attract and close more clients.

Much more than property search, we provide complete solutions that help you attract new prospects, bring in leads, close clients, and build repeat business. 

You can add our service to any website, without requiring  framing, or you can get one of our ready-to-use, hosted websites with IDX property search.

similar_products.short_desc: A complete solution to track capital, manage new investment opportunities and provide investors with a branded portal.
similar_products.features: Yardi Investment Manager is a complete platform for managing relations with current and prospective investors, tracking capital transactions and  insights into investment metrics. A branded investor portal provides timely access to data, operating and capital expenses, documents, and reports. For your compliance concerns, an entire audit trail of activity and communications. Adopt Investment Manager alone or connect it with Yardi Voyager or Yardi Breeze Premier to remove disparate data systems.

similar_products.short_desc: Zoho CRM is an omnichannel, online software for real estate agencies to manage business processes, sales & marketing.
similar_products.features: Zoho CRM enables real estate agents, developers, and brokerage firms to take control of their business processes. This omnichannel, cloud-based software solution is a centralized platform for sales process management, property management, and automation, and seamlessly integrates with 500+ third-party apps. Zoho CRM is mobile-friendly and allows users to access data and communicate with teams in real-time.

similar_products.short_desc: A CRM purpose-built for commercial real estate investment managers, designed to strengthen investor relationships.
similar_products.features: Juniper Square CRM enables real estate GPs to build a unified view of key relationships, increase internal collaboration, and streamline investor communication.

similar_products.short_desc: Drive growth with Sales Cloud 360, the best-in-class sales solution that drives rep productivity on the world's #1 CRM platform.
similar_products.features: Sales Cloud 360 is a customizable CRM platform that grows with your team. Empower agents to provide faster response times through instant messaging and personalized auto responses. Help them maintain relationships with reminders and nonintrusive client emails. Get real-time customer information and activity in one place, plus insights with dashboards and reports. Connect to thousands of business apps to extend your CRM to every department.

similar_products.features: Closing housing deals has never been easier thanks to Pipedrives powerful yet agile real estate CRM software. Keep everyone in your team focused on the activities that drive clients to purchase or rent, from property evaluations and showings, to communications strategies. Home sellers and property agents love Pipedrive for its versatility, intuitive design, and robust mobile CRM that keeps you updated on deals and activities while moving between properties.

similar_products.features: Airtable is the all-in-one collaboration platform that combines the flexibility of a spreadsheet interface with rich features like file attachments, kanban card stacks, calendars, and reporting.

similar_products.short_desc: AI software for brokers and lenders, that yields automated underwriting and lender matching at a 95% proven funding rate.
similar_products.features: (HWML) is software for brokers that automates the frontend underwriting process for Commercial, Residential, Business, & Personal loans. HWML's AI yields automation & loan matching at a 95% proven funding rate. The problem in the industry is a low 55% average at funding loans due to the fragmented lending process. We solved this problem by giving brokers, banks & consumers access to our software syndicated with 300+ lenders. HWML's platform has funded over $450M+ & loans from $100k-$50M!

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Commercial Real Estate software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Commercial Real Estate tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Commercial Real Estate software is used by commercial real estate agencies for managing their properties and by real estate investors for analyzing ROI on potential purchases.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Contact Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Contact Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Contact Management software provides powerful tools that enable storage, tracking, and management of contact information throughout an organization. Contact Management applications allow organizations to function more effectively by distributing current contact information for customers, contractors, vendors and others to all levels and locations of an organization. Contact Management solutions also often incorporate efficiency-increasing features such as lead management tools, employee task logs and customer interaction histories. Contact Management software is related to Campaign Management software, Lead Management software and Sales Force Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Relationship Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Relationship Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Relationship Management (CRM) software enables customer interaction, support and relationship management. The purpose of a CRM application is to enable organizations to better manage their customers through the introduction of reliable systems, processes and procedures. Customer Relationship Management software integrates organizational processes across marketing, sales and customer services. CRM software is related to Contract Management software and Online CRM software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Hospitality Property Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Hospitality Property Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Hospitality Property Management software automates the marketing, booking and billing of rooms for hotels, motels and resorts. Hotel managers use these applications to optimize the efficiency of their operations, speeding the process of filling and turning over rooms. Hospitality Property Management solutions offer a variety of vacancy monitoring features and integration for marketing and sales tools, as well as billing functions. Management tools for other functions such as maintenance requests and housekeeping schedules are also often included. Hospitality Property Management software is related to Real Estate Property Management software, Rental software and Reservations software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Lead Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Lead Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Lead Management software enables the forecasting, collection and tracking of sales leads. Through the use of Lead Management solutions, organizations can automate and manage their prospect database as well as share and distribute leads throughout the enterprise. Organizations can also use Lead Management tools to track the progress of leads, analyze the performance of sales staff and marketing campaigns and develop new leads from their existing customer base. Lead Management software is related to Contact Management software and Sales Force Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Lease Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Lease Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Lease Management software stores important data about leased property or equipment and also often includes financial or legal information. These applications offer powerful reporting tools while critical date email alarms allow organizations to proactively manage their real estate portfolios, mitigate risk and make more informed business decisions. Lease Management applications also support comprehensive management of the leasing process, tracking the flow of a lease from start to finish, shortening leasing cycle for office, industrial and retail and optimizing profits. Lease Management software is related to Real Estate Agency software and Real Estate Property Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Mac CRM software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Mac CRM tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Mac CRM software unifies your marketing, sales, and customer service processes across your company using your Mac. Customer relationship management applications help you manage your prospects and customers through the sales funnel. schedule follow-ups, and close more deals. Related categories include Customer Relationship Management software, Online CRM software, Financial CRM software, Construction CRM software, and Real Estate CRM software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Marketing Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Marketing Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Marketing Automation software enables organizations to automate their marketing functions including campaign creation, market segmentation and response analysis. These applications also allow greater integration between sales staff and management as well as expanded abilities to evaluate the effectiveness of marketing campaigns. Marketing Automation solutions enable the enterprise-wide sharing of information, providing an essential conduit between management, sales and marketing operations. Marketing Automation software is related to Campaign Management software, Email Marketing software and Search Marketing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Rental Property Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Rental Property Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Rental Property Management software provides financial and tenant tools to property management companies. Most often rental property management software is used to collect rental payments, track expenses, and engage tenants with online communities. Additional tools for property management companies can be found in the Lease Management software, Real Estate Property Management software, Vacation Rental software, and HOA software categories.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Real Estate Agency software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Real Estate Agency tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Real Estate Agency software automates business, marketing, and contact management activities for real estate sales and rental organizations. Real Estate Agency solutions manage listings, contacts, and inquiries and publishes property listings to the agency's website. These applications also enable the printing of flyers, catalogs, and reports. Contact management and email management are also common features of these software packages. Real Estate Agency software is related to Lease Management software and Real Estate Property Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Real Estate CMA software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Real Estate CMA tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Real Estate CMA software helps real estate agents create comparative market analysis presentations for their clients.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Real Estate Property Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Real Estate Property Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Real Estate Property Management software automates back office, financial, and operational tools for real estate property managers. These applications provide rental management software tools for apartments, rental housing, commercial property, mobile home parks, storage facilities and property owner associations and enable users to track tenant information, vacancies, and leasing agreements. Real Estate Property Management solutions enable reporting on revenue generation, operational costs, cash flow, budgeting and forecasting. Real Estate Property Management software is related to Hospitality Property Management software, Lease Management software and Real Estate Agency software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Real Estate Transaction Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Real Estate Transaction Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Real Estate Transaction Management software enables agents to create, share and electronically sign forms and contracts.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Sales Force Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Sales Force Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Sales Force Automation software manages an organization's sales force functions which can include: lead management, customer account management, contact management, quote management, forecasting, customer demographics and employee performance management. Sales Force Automation applications improve sales productivity while providing a method of distribution for sales analytics throughout an enterprise. Sales Force Automation software is related to Commission software, Contact Management software, Lead Management software and Quoting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Vacation Rental software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Vacation Rental tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Vacation Rental software is used by property owners of houses, apartments and condos, to manage the reservations and marketing of their properties for vacation goers as an alternative to hotels. These software products are typically also used by companies for Corporate Housing Management to maintain employee schedules in corporate owned properties as an alternative to extended stay hotels. Vacation Rental software is related to Hospitality Property Management software.

related_products.short_desc: Drive growth with Sales Cloud 360, the best-in-class sales solution that drives rep productivity on the world's #1 CRM platform.
related_products.features: Drive growth with Sales Cloud 360, the best-in-class sales solution that has helped power the world's best sales teams on the world's #1 CRM platform. Firms of all sizes, industries, and geographies, realize value faster with Sales Cloud 360. Increase rep productivity with data driven selling by quickly deploying industry-specific apps and best practice processes.  You also get access to 150,000+ sales organizations and a 2 million user-strong community that are passionate about sales growth.

related_products.short_desc: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster.
related_products.features: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster. As the backbone for your customer relationships, they provide AI-powered, user-friendly tools anyone can use to be successful. Mailchimp puts your audience at the center so you can send marketing emails and automated messages, create targeted ad campaigns, build landing pages, send postcards, facilitate reporting and analytics, and sell online.

related_products.short_desc: Zoho CRM empowers SMBs & enterprises with a 360? customer relationship lifecycle management solution built on an omnichannel platform.
related_products.features: Zoho CRM empowers SMBs & enterprises with a 360? customer relationship lifecycle management solution. Key features include contact management, sales funnels, pipeline management, workflow automation, AI-powered conversational assistant, task management, managing marketing campaigns, sales forecasting, customer support & service, inventory management, reporting & analytics, and seamlessly integrate with 500+ popular business apps in a single business system.

related_products.short_desc: HubSpot CRM has everything you need to organize, track, and build better relationships with leads and customers.
related_products.features: Whether you've got a small team of five or a sophisticated sales force of 500, HubSpot offers pricing and packaging options that grow with you. HubSpot customer relationship management (CRM) software is built for companies that want to spend less time logging data. It keeps all your contacts in one centralized, customizable database. And you can see everything about a lead in one place -- no more digging through inboxes to find information. Start using the free HubSpot CRM today.

related_products.short_desc: ClickUp is the future of work - it's one app to replace them all. ClickUp is the #1 fastest growing productivity app in 2022.
related_products.features:
ClickUp is an all-in-one productivity platform that eliminates work silos. It's the hub where teams come together to plan, organize, and collaborate on work using tasks, Docs, Chat, Goals, Whiteboards, and more. 

Easily customized with just a few clicks, ClickUp helps teams of all types and sizes deliver work more effectively. By replacing inflexible and overlapping tools, ClickUp helps teams save one day each week!

related_products.short_desc: Pipedrive is an easy to implement CRM software tool that helps you focus on the activities that drive deals to close.
related_products.features: Pipedrive is a sales-focused customer relationship management tool that teams of all sizes love using. With 100'000+ paying customers spanning across 179 countries, sales teams are drawn in by our CRMs simple yet powerful design that prioritizes usability above all else. When using Pipedrive, nothing falls through the cracks, allowing your team to spend less time filing and more time selling with a CRM software that is both agile and powerful.

related_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
related_products.features:
Smartsheet, an online work execution platform, empowers organizations to plan, track, automate, and report on work. Over 80,000 brands rely on Smartsheet for project and work management because of its easy-to-use interface, real-time gantt charts and dashboards, and work automation features. 
*2018 Awards: Named a Leader in Enterprise Collaborative Work Management by Forrester Research, Selected to Deloittes Fast 500 List, Recognized for Technology Innovation & Vision by 451 Research

related_products.short_desc: Nimble is the simple, smart CRM for Office 365 & G Suite that works for you -- everywhere you work.
related_products.features: Nimble is the simple, smart CRM for Office 365 & G Suite that works for you by automatically combining your contacts, communication histories, email inboxes, and calendar appointments with over 250+ SaaS business app contacts and social media connections (including Linkedin, Twitter, Facebook) into one unified team relationship manager.

related_products.short_desc: ActiveCampaign CRM helps you sell more in less time by combining automated lead prioritization, task creation, and contact management.
related_products.features: ActiveCampaign's CRM combines contact organization with sales automation, helping you sell more in less time. Prioritize your leads, keep track of your tasks, and automate contact management so nothing falls through the cracks. See your whole sales process at a glance and track every interaction, keeping your team on the same page. Features like lead scoring, win probability, and automated segmentation combined with marketing automation turns your team into a well-oiled, deal-closing machine.

related_products.short_desc:
The smarter way for small businesses to do great work
Keap organizes your client information & daily work in one place, freeing you up
related_products.features: Grow your business with the all-in-one CRM, sales & marketing software for serious business owners. Our platform organizes your customer information and daily work in one place, freeing you up from repetitive tasks so you have more time to focus on growing your business.

related_products.short_desc: Run your business your way with a fully integrated CRM for small to medium sized businesses.
related_products.features: Stay organized as you scale and grow. Finally, a CRM that?s easy to use, fully customizable and puts you in control of how you manage your leads, customers, tasks, team, projects, marketing and more. Create your free account to start customizing your CRM today.

similar_products.short_desc: Improve your team's accountability and productivity with flexible CRM that matches your sales process exactly.

similar_products.short_desc:

similar_products.short_desc: monday sales CRM empowers sales teams to manage every aspect of their sales cycle and customer data in one centralized place.

Dubbed the CRM without the frustration, it handles all sales processes and client communication in one place. From capturing leads, managing contact info, tracking deals or collaborating across departments, monday sales CRM lets you manage it all. You can use built-in automations or easily create your own to streamline any manual work so you can focus more time on sales.

With VipeCloud's single solution + rapport building, your business will increase efficiency and accelerate growth. It's no surprise 99% of customers rate our support at 4+ stars.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Contact Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Contact Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Contact Management software provides powerful tools that enable storage, tracking, and management of contact information throughout an organization. Contact Management applications allow organizations to function more effectively by distributing current contact information for customers, contractors, vendors and others to all levels and locations of an organization. Contact Management solutions also often incorporate efficiency-increasing features such as lead management tools, employee task logs and customer interaction histories. Contact Management software is related to Campaign Management software, Lead Management software and Sales Force Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Lead Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Lead Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Lead Management software enables the forecasting, collection and tracking of sales leads. Through the use of Lead Management solutions, organizations can automate and manage their prospect database as well as share and distribute leads throughout the enterprise. Organizations can also use Lead Management tools to track the progress of leads, analyze the performance of sales staff and marketing campaigns and develop new leads from their existing customer base. Lead Management software is related to Contact Management software and Sales Force Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Marketing Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Marketing Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Marketing Automation software enables organizations to automate their marketing functions including campaign creation, market segmentation and response analysis. These applications also allow greater integration between sales staff and management as well as expanded abilities to evaluate the effectiveness of marketing campaigns. Marketing Automation solutions enable the enterprise-wide sharing of information, providing an essential conduit between management, sales and marketing operations. Marketing Automation software is related to Campaign Management software, Email Marketing software and Search Marketing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Sales Force Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Sales Force Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Sales Force Automation software manages an organization's sales force functions which can include: lead management, customer account management, contact management, quote management, forecasting, customer demographics and employee performance management. Sales Force Automation applications improve sales productivity while providing a method of distribution for sales analytics throughout an enterprise. Sales Force Automation software is related to Commission software, Contact Management software, Lead Management software and Quoting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Sales Tracking software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Sales Tracking tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Sales Tracking software enables businesses and sales teams to monitor pipelines, manage steps in the sales process, and track key performance numbers.
